      • assignStyleClassToNodes

        public static void assignStyleClassToNodes(java.lang.String className,
                                           javafx.scene.Node... nodes)
        Assign given CSS class name to one or more nodes
        Parameters:
        className - Name of CSS class to assign
        nodes - Nodes to which CSS class must be assigned

      • centerNode

        public static void centerNode(javafx.scene.control.Control control)
        Position given node at center of screen, assuming we are working in a Pane
        Parameters:
        control - Node to position

      • getScreenCenter

        public static com.sun.javafx.geom.Point2D getScreenCenter()
        Returns:
        X-Y coordinate of middle of screen

      • callMethodAfterTime

        public static javafx.animation.Timeline callMethodAfterTime(java.lang.Object target,
                                                            java.lang.String methodName,
                                                            double timeInMillis)
        Uses a Timeline object to call a method on an object after a given duration.
        Parameters:
        target - Object on which method will be called
        methodName - Method to call
        timeInMillis - Duration to wait before calling the method
        Returns:
        The Timeline object created for the delayed call if successful, otherwise null

      • createButton

        public static javafx.scene.control.Button createButton(java.lang.String textKey,
                                                       boolean useKey)
        Creates and returns a JavaFX button
        Parameters:
        textKey - Key in messages bundle for button text
        useKey - True if textKey must be used to read message bundle, instead of being used as-is
        Returns:
        New JavaFX button

      • createLabel

        public static javafx.scene.control.Label createLabel(java.lang.String textKey,
                                                     boolean useKey)
        Creates and returns a JavaFX label
        Parameters:

        useKey - True if textKey must be used to read message bundle, instead of being used as-is
        Returns:
        New JavaFX label

      • getHighestWidthOfControls

        public static double getHighestWidthOfControls(javafx.scene.control.Control[] controls)
        Calculates and returns the highest width of all given controls.
        Parameters:
        controls - List of Control objects to be checked
        Returns:
        Highest width amongst all given Control objects

      • layoutControlPairsInGridWithTitleStartingAtPosition

        public static double layoutControlPairsInGridWithTitleStartingAtPosition(javafx.scene.control.Control title,
                                                                         javafx.scene.control.Control[] firstColumnControls,
                                                                         javafx.scene.control.Control[] secondColumnControls,
                                                                         com.sun.javafx.geom.Point2D position)
        Layouts given fields in a 2 column grid. This method assumes that the two controls arrays have the same size.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to be displayed above the grid
        firstColumnControls - First column of controls to layout
        secondColumnControls - Second column of controls to layout
        position - The starting position to layout all the fields
        Returns:
        The Y coordinate of the last laid out element
